t: Amazon.com: KUS
s: KUS is the world’s leading manufacturer and provider of liquid level sending products and solutions. The company has more than 30 years of experience as ODM and OEM provider to global brands across the on-road/off-road vehicle, marine, industrial, and power generation industries.
